mods.abstract: RUNAWY, IN JAIL. HAS committed in the Jail of this parish on the 13th day of December, A. D. 1861, a mulatto boy named MORVAN, aged about 25 years, said boy is six feet high, and says he belongs to John Douglas, of the parish of Rapides. The owner of said boy is required to come forward prove property, pay charges, and take him away, or he will be dealt with according to law. J. B. PLAISANCE, Jailor. Natchitoches, Jany. 9th 1862.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
